lyrics.lyric: B What U Wanna B
lyrics.tlyric: 成为那个你想成为的人

lyrics.lyric: doctor, actor, lawyer or a singer
lyrics.tlyric: 医生演员律师或歌唱家

lyrics.lyric: why not president, be a dreamer
lyrics.tlyric: 为什么不是总统？做一个有梦想的人

lyrics.lyric: you can be just the one you wanna be
lyrics.tlyric: 你可以成为任何一个你想成为的人

lyrics.lyric: police man, fire fighter or a post man
lyrics.tlyric: 警察消防员或者邮递员

lyrics.lyric: why not something like your old man
lyrics.tlyric: 为什么不是像你老爸那样的人？

lyrics.lyric: you can be just the one you wanna be
lyrics.tlyric: 你可以成为任何一个你想成为的人

lyrics.lyric: doctor, actor, lawyer or a singer
lyrics.tlyric: 医生演员律师或者歌唱家

lyrics.lyric: why not president, be a dreamer
lyrics.tlyric: 为什么不是总统？做一个有梦想的人

lyrics.lyric: you can be just the one you wanna be
lyrics.tlyric: 你可以成为任何一个你想成为的人

lyrics.lyric: I know that we all got one thing
lyrics.tlyric: 我知道我们都得到一样东西

lyrics.lyric: that we all share together
lyrics.tlyric: 那就是我们都在分享的

lyrics.lyric: we got that one nice dream
lyrics.tlyric: 我们都拥有一个美好的梦想

lyrics.lyric: we live for
lyrics.tlyric: 我们为之生存

lyrics.lyric: you never know what life could bring
lyrics.tlyric: 你不会知道生活会给你带来什么

lyrics.lyric: cause nothing last for ever
lyrics.tlyric: 因为没有什么能永恒

lyrics.lyric: just hold on to the team
lyrics.tlyric: 只是坚持住

lyrics.lyric: you play for
lyrics.tlyric: 为了你所努力的团队

lyrics.lyric: I know you could reach the top
lyrics.tlyric: 我知道你会达到顶峰

lyrics.lyric: make sure that you won't stop
lyrics.tlyric: 你一定不要停下来

lyrics.lyric: be the one that you wanna be
lyrics.tlyric: 做那个你一直都想成为的人

lyrics.lyric: now sing this with me
lyrics.tlyric: 现在和我一起歌唱

lyrics.lyric: doctor, actor, lawyer or a singer
lyrics.tlyric: 医生演员律师或歌唱家

lyrics.lyric: why not president, be a dreamer
lyrics.tlyric: 为什么不是总统？做一个有梦想的人

lyrics.lyric: you can be just the one you wanna be
lyrics.tlyric: 你可以成为任何一个你想成为的人

lyrics.lyric: police man, fire fighter or a post man
lyrics.tlyric: 警察消防员或者邮递员

lyrics.lyric: why not something like your old man
lyrics.tlyric: 为什么不是像你老爸那样的人？

lyrics.lyric: you can be just the one you wanna be
lyrics.tlyric: 你可以成为任何一个你想成为的人

lyrics.lyric: we may have different ways to think
lyrics.tlyric: 我们也许会从不同角度考虑问题

lyrics.lyric: but it doesn't really matter
lyrics.tlyric: 但这没关系

lyrics.lyric: we all caught up in the steam
lyrics.tlyric: 我们都赶上了

lyrics.lyric: of this life
lyrics.tlyric: 这次人生之旅

lyrics.lyric: focus on every little thing
lyrics.tlyric: 执著于每一件琐事

lyrics.lyric: that's what does really matter
lyrics.tlyric: 这才是问题所在

lyrics.lyric: luxury cars and bling
lyrics.tlyric: 豪车和珠宝

lyrics.lyric: that's not real life
lyrics.tlyric: 那都不是真正的生活

lyrics.lyric: I know you could reach the top
lyrics.tlyric: 我知道你会达到顶峰

lyrics.lyric: make sure that you won't stop
lyrics.tlyric: 确定你不会停下来

lyrics.lyric: be the one that you wanna be
lyrics.tlyric: 做那个你一直都想成为的人

lyrics.lyric: now sing this with me
lyrics.tlyric: 现在和我一起歌唱

lyrics.lyric: doctor, actor, lawyer or a singer
lyrics.tlyric: 医生演员律师或歌唱家

lyrics.lyric: why not president, be a dreamer
lyrics.tlyric: 为什么不是总统？做一个有梦想的人

lyrics.lyric: you can be just the one you wanna be

lyrics.lyric: police man, fire fighter or a post man
lyrics.tlyric: 警察消防员或者邮递员

lyrics.lyric: why not something like your old man
lyrics.tlyric: 为什么不是像你老爸那样的人？

lyrics.lyric: you can be just the one you wanna be
lyrics.tlyric: 你可以成为任何一个你想成为的人

lyrics.lyric: last year I used to dream about this day
lyrics.tlyric: 去年我还在梦想着有这么一天

lyrics.lyric: now I'm here I'm singing for you
lyrics.tlyric: 现在这一切都实现我将为你而唱

lyrics.lyric: I hope I could inspire you
lyrics.tlyric: 我希望我能鼓舞你的斗志

lyrics.lyric: cause I've got all the love, cause I've got all love for you
lyrics.tlyric: 因为我得到了所有的爱我得到了 我对你所有的爱
